SELECT A.SettingID AS "SettingID" , A.DomainID AS "DomainID" , A.SettingType AS "SettingType" , A.SettingKey AS "SettingKey" , A.SettingName AS "SettingName" , A.SettingValue AS "SettingValue" , A.Description AS "Description" , A.IsUse AS "IsUse" FROM ( SELECT 0 AS SettingID , A.DomainID , A.SettingType , A.SettingKey , A.SettingName , '' AS SettingValue , A.Description , 'Y' AS IsUse FROM jwf_setting A INNER JOIN sys_object_domain B ON A.DomainID = B.DomainID
UNION ALL
SELECT A.CodeID , A.DomainID , CASE WHEN A.CodeGroup = 'ApprovalProperties' THEN 'PropetiesFile' ELSE 'BaseCode' END , A.Code , A.CodeName , '' , TO_CLOB(A.Description) , A.IsUse FROM sys_base_code A INNER JOIN sys_object_domain B ON A.DomainID = B.DomainID WHERE A.BizSection = 'Approval' AND A.CodeGroup IN ('CodeGroup', 'ApprovalProperties')
AND ( A.DomainID = #{domainID} OR ( A.DomainID = 0 AND A.Code NOT IN ( SELECT Code FROM sys_base_code where BizSection = 'Approval' AND CodeGroup IN ('CodeGroup', 'ApprovalProperties') AND DomainID = #{domainID} ) ) )
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ConfigID , A.DomainID , 'BaseConfig' , A.SettingKey , A.ConfigName , A.SettingValue , A.Description , A.IsUse FROM sys_base_config A INNER JOIN sys_object_domain B ON A.DomainID = B.DomainID WHERE A.BizSection = 'Approval'
AND ( A.DomainID = #{domainID} OR ( A.DomainID = 0 AND A.SettingKey NOT IN ( SELECT SettingKey FROM sys_base_config where BizSection = 'Approval' AND DomainID = #{domainID} ) ) )
) A
AND A.SettingType = #{settingType}
AND A.IsUse = #{isUse}
AND
SettingKey SettingName SettingValue Description
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ( SettingKey LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR SettingName LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR SettingValue LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR Description LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' )
SettingKey SettingName SettingValue IsUse
ASC DESC
IsUse DESC
